name: guildsettings
description: Change or view settings for your server.

options.name: defaultchannel
options.description: Set the default channel for the server. Leave empty to select current channel.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to set as the default channel.

options.name: winnerrole
options.description: Set or unset the winner role for the server.

options.name: role
options.description: The role to set as the winner role.

options.name: permissionrole
options.description: Set or unset the permission role for the server.

options.name: role
options.description: The role you would like to use as permission role.
